meta.name: nginx
meta.description: Dashboard for the telegraf input plug-in: NGINX
meta.author: influxdata

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("accepts"), 1s) AS "accepts", non_negative_derivative(max("handled"), 1s) AS "handled", non_negative_derivative(max("active"), 1s) AS "active" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."nginx" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("accepts")) - non_negative_derivative(max("handled")) FROM ":db:".":rp:"."nginx" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("requests"), 1s) AS "requests" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."nginx" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("waiting"), 1s) AS "waiting", non_negative_derivative(max("reading"), 1s) AS "reading", non_negative_derivative(max("writing"), 1s) AS "writing" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."nginx" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
